entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Follow-ups to improve the experience when using Blazor Server and WebAssembly components together #48396
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Missing package README file #48392
  • model binding to one class doesn't work as expected and documented #48391
  • Issues using Blazor Multithreading within iframes #48390
  • [API Proposal]: Provide async callback for ClientCertificateValidation in Kestrel #48384
  • Two Map* methods on the same source line cause InvalidCastException with Request Delegate Generator #48383
  • Do not emit unused code with Request Delegate Generator #48381
  • Application using Request Delegate Generator fails to start with KeyNotFoundException #48379
  • Request Delegate Generator fails to compile endpoint with Uri? parameter with CS8600 errors #48378
  • Request Delegate Generator code counts as user code for code coverage #48376
  • Quarantine ResponseCachingMiddlewareTests.FinalizeCacheHeadersAsync_ResponseValidity_UseExpiryIfAvailable #48373
    Test failures

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson Package Missing README File #48394
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore Missing Package README File #48393
  • Ability to run Blazor Server and WebAssembly components side-by-side in the same document #48032
    8.0-preview5
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.Tests.HostingApplicationTests.IHttpActivityFeatureIsPopulated #35142
    Test failures
  • Accept-Language Header is not validated by RFC 9110 specification #48318
  • app.UseRouting must be called after `UsePathBase` #48370
  • Use versioned python3 command in scripts #48221
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Enable JSON format output for `user-jwts list` #45141
    7.0.x
  • [Question] .NET6 Minimal API model binding error handling and Environment. #48355

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test retries to FinalizeCacheHeadersAsync_ResponseValidity_UseExpiryIfAvailable #48389
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2186826 #48387
    area-mvc
  • DO NOT REVIEW Add a trimming test that always fails for experimental purposes #48386
    needs-area-label, area-hosting
  • Update project resolution and app settings writes in `dotnet user-jwts` #48385
    area-commandlinetools, feature-userjwts
  • Add [GeneratedCode] for more RDG output #48377
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Rename ASP.NET Core metrics #48375
    blocked, area-runtime, area-signalr

Merged

  • [Blazor] Update discovery APIs and automatically configure the endpoints based on the discovered RenderModes #48283
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Enable Blazor Server and WebAssembly components to run in the same document #48294
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Add a test confirming that X509Certificate is trimmed #48295
    area-hosting, 8.0-preview5
  • Quarantine ResponseCachingMiddlewareTests.FinalizeCacheHeadersAsync_ResponseValidity_UseExpiryIfAvailable #48374
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5
  • Unquarantine `IHttpActivityFeatureIsPopulated` #48371
    area-infrastructure, area-hosting, 8.0-preview5
  • DisableInferBodyFromParameters in RDG. #48269
    area-runtime, feature-rdg, 8.0-preview5
  • [blazor] Read appsettings loaded by the runtime into the VFS #48326
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview5
  • [Blazor] Add new Blazor Web Template #48285
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • Try updating to python3 #48367
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • HttpContext debugger display tweaks and fixes #48321
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Source generator to create the discovery information at compile time. #48284
    area-blazor
  • Update JSInProcessObjectReference.cs #48287
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #48338
    area-signalr
  • Migrate RDF-specific tests to shared infrastructure (part 2) #48369
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching
  • Issue #45096 Toru_Watanbe #48352
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
